      • findFile

        public static java.lang.String findFile(java.lang.String name)
        Search for a file. The directories searched are the root directory (if specified), and /resources/html/.
        Parameters:
        name - The name of the file to search for.
        Returns:
        If the path is found, the absolute path of the file. Otherwise, returns null.
